title: How to make Buttercream Flowers – The Sunflower
description: Learn how easy it is to make a buttercream sunflower. This simple flower looks adorable topped on top of a cake or cupcake.

asset.author: Wilton
asset.description:
Learn how easy it is to make a buttercream sunflower. This simple flower looks adorable topped on top of a cake or cupcake. 
Stay Sweet, Subscribe: http://s.wilton.com/10vmhuv
You’ll need: 
- Flower Nail - http://bit.ly/2d05OnG 
- Tip 12 - http://bit.ly/2dky8lK 
- Tip 352 -  http://bit.ly/2dBlH7k 
- Tip 16 - http://bit.ly/2dZzas8 
- Chocolate Decorator Icing - http://bit.ly/2dkz3mg 
- 3 Eggs
- 1 cup solid vegetable shortening
- 1/2 cup (1 stick) butter, softened
- 7 cups Confectioners' Sugar (about 1-3/4 pound)
- 5 tablespoons heavy whipping cream
- Maraschino cherries

Want more tips? Subscribe: http://s.wilton.com/10vmhuv
